hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Abdullah bin Zubair bin ‘Awwam that his father said:“When the following was reveled: “Then on that Day you shall be asked about the delights (you indulged in, in this world)! [102:8] Zubair said: ‘What delights shall we be asked about? It is only the two black ones, dates and water.’ He said: ‘It is going to happen.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَعِيشَةِ أَصْحَابِ النَّبِيِّ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ
chapter.eng-name: The livelihood of the companions of the Prophet (ﷺ)
